Description: St Antony the Great, standing at centre, bearded and wearing a monk's cloak, holding a bell and a tau shaped crutch; a boar seen next to him, to right; after Schongauer. Engraving
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (1329.II) (Wierix)
Mauquoy-Hendrickx 1979 / Les Estampes des Wierix ... catalogue raisonné (1063)
Alvin 1866 / Catalogue raisonné de l'oeuvre des trois frères Jan, Jérome et Antoine Wierix (845)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
